mapper.select: WITH MAIN_ACT_NUM(NUM) AS ( SELECT ACT_NUM FROM ACTIVITY_SET WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum} AND STATUS = '1' ), ACT_TOTLE_COST(COST) AS ( SELECT sum(COST) FROM ACTIVITY_DT, MAIN_ACT_NUM WHERE ACT_NUM = NUM ), PARTNER_COUNT(COUNT) AS ( SELECT sum(USER_NUM) FROM ACTIVITY_SET, MAIN_ACT_NUM WHERE ACT_NUM = NUM AND STATUS = '1' ) SELECT AB.ACT_NUM, AB.ACT_TITLE, AB.ACT_DESC, CASE WHEN AU.USER_NAME IS NULL THEN AU.USER_LINE_NAME ELSE AU.USER_NAME END AS USER_NAME, AB.START_DATE, COST AS CURRENT_COST, COUNT AS USER_COUNT FROM MAIN_ACT_NUM JOIN ACTIVITY_BASIC AB ON NUM = AB.ACT_NUM JOIN APP_USER AU ON AB.USER_NUM = AU.USER_NUM LEFT JOIN ACTIVITY_DT AD ON AB.ACT_NUM = AD.ACT_NUM, ACT_TOTLE_COST,PARTNER_COUNT
